name: Cheese
description: Cheese is a dairy product produced in wide ranges of flavors, textures, and forms by coagulation of the milk protein casein.

name: Butter Milk
description: Buttermilk is a fermented dairy drink that originated as the liquid left behind after churning butter out of cultured cream

name: Milk
description: Milk is a white liquid food produced by the mammary glands of mammals. It is the primary source of nutrition for young mammals (including breastfed human infants) before they are able to digest solid food.

name: Butter
description: Butter is a dairy product made from the fat and protein components of churned cream.It is a semi-solid emulsion at room temperature, consisting of approximately 80% butterfat

name: Yogurt
description: Yogurt, also known as yoghurt, yogourt, or yoghourt, is a dairy product made by bacterial fermentation of milk
